name: FeatureProcessSteps
description: Split-layout feature section with text on left and numbered process steps with timeline on right.

title.example: Getting you results without the complexity

description.example: Our three-step process takes you from identifying opportunities to launching systems, with clear communication and support at every stage.

structure.number: string - Step number to display (required, e.g., '01', '02', '1', '2')
structure.title: string - Step title (required, e.g., 'Discovery & Assessment')
structure.tag: string - Optional tag/badge for the step (e.g., 'Week 1', 'Ongoing')

stepsRules.note: Minimum 2 steps required, but 3+ steps recommended for optimal visual balance. Each step shows a numbered card with a connecting timeline line.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.steps: Array<{ number: string, title: string, description: string, tag?: string }>
